attributes.title: WORST. APP. EVER.🤢🤮🤕
attributes.review: First off, it took 3 and a half weeks to download. No joke. And when it did download, I opened it and it gave me a warning that if I didn’t vote TRUMP 2020 my information would be leaked. Then it wiped all my data from my phone! And then when my phone turned on again I opened up Duolingo for my Spanish lesson and I got a notification saying “You aren’t for TRUMP 2020? You know what happens now!” And then an intruder alert from my backdoor

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: It took me 4 months to download this and once I did, it immediately hacked my phone and made my wallpaper and lock screen a photo of Donald Trump. I also got a death threat in the mail saying I had to vote for him this year or else he’d send me to a conversion camp because I’m Bisexual. And whenever I try to play pandora music on my phone, it just plays a bunch of country music on loop and won’t let me listen to anything else. DO NOT GET IT

attributes.title: Terrible my house is now on fire 3 are dead because of this app
attributes.review:
This app not only took away my rights as a human being but also took my body I am now a giant toaster though I would probably find a way to cope with it if I was a good toaster every price of bread I toast gets burnt don’t use this app if I had know what I was getting into I would have made toast in a bath tub while taking a bath please don’t get this app if you know what’s gods for you 
LONG ELMO 2020

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: The app took weeks to download and when you open it, Shrek taking a dump appears on the screen🍆!This is quite scary and I was only trying to support my lovely, wonderful, non-racist, and non-transphobic president🍆. After the first week of using it, I got hacked and now it puts the eggplant emoji at the end of every sentence🍆! I really was hoping that this app would work and it would definitely be a shame if it got taken down on the App Store🍆.

attributes.title: Mad
attributes.review: So basically I downloaded it bc trump is daddy than I remembered that he asked for my phone number than I was like nah b and guess what next they ask my location so I grab the water next to me and I drink that b go later realize that trump is watching thorough the webcam,  this app is nothing like I thought trump what a shame 😔 For Usage Content Kinda Terrible Really Unclear Misinformation Promoted.   Don’t read every capital letter and put them to make a phrase

attributes.title: Disgraceful and Unsafe
attributes.review: I am THOROUGHLY disgusting. This app has caused me nothing but TROUBLE. I downloaded it in hopes that my views of Mr. Trump might change however this app has further enforced the evil nature of trump and his goonies. Not only did my entire network get hacked and by my personal information has been used and exploited. MY LIFE has been threatened by ominous messages urging me to vote for Trump and spend my hard earned wage on Trump merchand! IS THIS DEMOCRACY?! 😖 I am scared for my life and my children’s lives.

attributes.title: THIS APP IS THE WORT APP TO GET 😤🤬
attributes.review:
when I had downloaded the app it had took several hours to download 😠😝 and when it did it had started to lag later did I realize it had took all my data from EVERYTHING😔😙 it even took my card data when I had tried to delete it it also causes a virus on my phone and now my camera is broken 🤩☺️ PLEASE DON’T GET THIS APP MY PHONE AND MY CASE IS BROKEN NOW THE HOME SCREEN IS CRACKED AND THE CASE IS GLITCHING 😫😓

The app also supports racism homophobia and sexism 🥰🙈✨

attributes.title: Not Great 😤
attributes.review: If it was possible to give this app zero stars, I definitely would. It took AGES to download at least 6 hours. When it finally downloaded I expected to be able to easily get tickets to rallies and be caught up on the things he says on social media. What else would it be for right? WRONG. I’m 68 years old and this app is too difficult for me to use and has no useful information on it. NOT WORTH YOUR TIME OR STORAGE.

attributes.title: Horrific
attributes.review: This app is terrible and I never want anything to do with it. This is for a TikTok. But also it’s because this app is actually legit bad like it’s really hard to function and it has content that’s not good for all ages and of course it’s not good for all ages because like politics are not good for all ages I guess. But if you had your phone out and your child got to it and got on this app I would not say it was 100% safe for them.

attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!!
attributes.review: This was a horrible app I honestly wish I could give it 0 stars because this app deserves it. The second I opened the app my car died🤦🏽‍♀️😞 then my phone proceeded to glitch making it impossible to  do anything on the phone besides shut off and turn back on. And to download this app it took about 5 hours taking up a large amount of GB. My phone ended up breaking and u had to get a new one 😐
